author: Alim Kheraj
title: Chrissy Teigen had the most hilarious response to people saying John Legend looks like Arthur the aardvark
text:
Chrissy Teigen had the most hilarious response to people saying John Legend looks like Arthur the aardvark If you ever had any doubt that Chrissy Teigen knows her way around a meme, her latest hilarious tweet about people comparing John Legend to Arthur the aardvark is should put any questions out of your mind.
We know that Chrissy Teigen loves having a lol on social media . The star has a quick wit (seriously, she should be doing stand up, right?), and we love seeing her hilarious take down of trolls , her honesty about life‚Äôs hurdles , and the dead funny stories that she regales us with . In fact, we‚Äôd pretty much pay good money for a compilation book of Chrissy‚Äôs tweets.
Hate this macbook relationship. "When do you want to update?" "Later" "later today or later tomorrow?" Oh my god just fucking LATER
‚Äî christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) January 22, 2016 Now Chrissy Teigen has killed it again, with a hilarious meme on Twitter, and we can‚Äôt stop laughing. The whole thing started when people on social media started noticing that Chrissy‚Äôs husband, the singer John Legend, looks a bit like (okay, a lot like) Arthur the aardvark.
John Legend look like Arthur lowkey pic.twitter.com/bfeG3cYo4M 
‚Äî Emily Sowah (@sowahblanket) February 20, 2017 This quickly went viral and spiralled out of control. People on the internet are WILD.
@jenevamonique1 @sowahblanket pic.twitter.com/cF416XgDNX 
‚Äî b s t f r n d ‚ò• ü•ë (@bstfrnd__) February 20, 2017 @sowahblanket pic.twitter.com/ZmxIZmOSJw 
‚Äî b s t f r n d ‚ò• ü•ë (@bstfrnd__) February 20, 2017 After seeing the tweet, Chrissy decided to add her own hilarious spin by co-opting the angry Arthur meme , and it‚Äôs actually brilliant.
‚ÄúJohn when you tell him he looks like Arthur,‚Äù she wrote. John when you tell him he looks like Arthur pic.twitter.com/0NW3NDtAb1 
‚Äî christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 21, 2017 LOL!
As if this weren‚Äôt already hilarious in its own right, John Legend replied to the whole thing saying that he didn‚Äôt even know who Arthur was (SERIOUSLY?!)
@chrissyteigen I hadn't even heard of this Arthur character til now. Was he around when I was a kid?
‚Äî John Legend (@johnlegend) February 21, 2017 This then sparked off a whole string of funny responses.
@chrissyteigen @johnlegend right now LOL pic.twitter.com/4kInOnQTah 
‚Äî Erick Fernandez (@ErickFernandez) February 21, 2017 @johnlegend @chrissyteigen when everyone says you look like Arthur, but you just don't see it. pic.twitter.com/QQsma031a7 
‚Äî Erick Fernandez (@ErickFernandez) February 21, 2017 @johnlegend @chrissyteigen 
Millennials: "YOU DON'T KNOW ARTHUR" pic.twitter.com/q58lxtl4As 
‚Äî Emily Sowah (@sowahblanket) February 21, 2017 @johnlegend @chrissyteigen pic.twitter.com/ZIJnZfISbA 
‚Äî Alexis Moore ‚ôä (@alexis__19xx) February 21, 2017 . @johnlegend @chrissyteigen pic.twitter.com/e4FcAwDWmG 
‚Äî Lauren Warren (@iamlaurenp) February 21, 2017 God bless Chrissy Teigen and God bless the internet.
